descriptionHtml:
Mercenary Soldier Armor Ver.1.0 by Eferas

This mod adds a set of heavy armor (cuirass, gauntlets and boots) named Mercenary Soldier, strong as the ebony set, craftable at the forge under the ebony category (no perks required) and updatable.
[b]Only male version, the female version is just the steel cuirass with ebony stats.[/b][u][color=red][size=12pt][/size][/color][/u]

How to install:
Copy everything and past in your data folder.

How to unistall:
Delete esp and files.


Credits:
-"aMidianBorn Book of Silence" by CaBaL, for the awesome steel cuirass and plate shoulders textures.
-"Iron Elven Armor for Male And Females" by Sabor, for the iron elven gauntlet textures.
-"The Witcher 2 Models" by LordOfWar, for porting the boots meshes and textures from the Witcher 2 game.
author: Eferas
